act_1_setup.purpose: Introduction of world, characters (Who, Where, What, Why), and inciting incident
act_1_setup.emotion: Allows audience to settle, establishes empathy and backstory
act_1_setup.guidelines: Express story beats as spatial shifts. Use 'prolog' style for transportation.

act_2_complication.purpose: Confrontation and escalation of obstacles; shifting relationships
act_2_complication.technical: Tighter framing, shorter cuts, contradictory visuals
act_2_complication.emotion: Contains the 'darkest moment' (lowest emotional point) at 3/4 mark
act_2_complication.guidelines: Use conversational density (60% of shots) to carry conflict

act_3_climax.purpose: Convergence of tensions; character transformation made visible
act_3_climax.technical: Rapid-fire cuts, sustained tension through static composition
act_3_climax.guidelines: Converge 'narration time' with 'narrative time' for urgency

85mm.name: Telephoto
85mm.effect: Isolation, abstracts subject for intense focus

triangle_method.impact: Intensifies connection; dynamic tension; represents group hierarchies
triangle_method.prompt: Three characters in a triangular formation, shifting focus, power struggle

power_dynamics.prompt_submissive: character off-center, small in frame, looking up

motivated_realism.principle: Every light source should appear to originate from a visible source (Deakins Principle)
motivated_realism.prompt: dim interior lit by a single desk lamp, matching practical lamp color

color_temperature.mixing: Suggests psychological conflict when warm and cool are combined

negative_fill.technique: Subtracting light to create shape, mood, and dimension
negative_fill.impact: Enhances brooding atmosphere; adds contours; noir intensity
negative_fill.prompt: Deep shadows, low-key lighting, heavy negative fill, high contrast

sound_design.silence_rule: Silence after high-density sound creates weight and suspense
sound_design.guideline: Avoid clich√©s; use silence to let emotional weight settle
